languages.text: "Явиться сюда было не самым разумным поступком, Ваша Светлость. Вы и ваша династия {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}утратили мое доверие{/d}, и сегодня вас ждет трибунал".
"Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."
languages.original_text: "Явиться сюда было не самым разумным поступком, Ваша Светлость. Вы и ваша династия {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}утратили мое доверие{/d}, и сегодня вас ждет трибунал".

traits.locale_text: "Coming here wasn't the best decision, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have lost my trust, and now a tribunal is awaiting you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Coming here wasn't the best decision, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have lost my trust, and now a tribunal is awaiting you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Coming here wasn't the best decision, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have lost my trust, and you are about to be tried at a martial court."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Coming here wasn't the best decision, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have lost my trust, and you are about to be tried at a martial court."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have lost my trust, and now a tribunal awaits you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Vous avez fait preuve d'imprudence en venant ici, Votre Seigneurie. Votre dynastie a {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}perdu ma confiance{/d} et maintenant, un tribunal vous attend. »
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez fait preuve d'imprudence en venant ici, Votre Seigneurie. Votre dynastie a perdu ma confiance et maintenant, un tribunal vous attend. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «No ha sido muy prudente por su parte venir aquí, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tanto usted como su dinastía han {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}perdido mi confianza{/d}, y ahora recibirá mi sentencia».
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."

traits.locale_text: «Venir hasta aquí no ha sido una de sus mejores decisiones, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Usted y su dinastía ya no cuentan con mi confianza y pronto se encontrará frente a un tribunal militar».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “你来这里恐怕实在是不智之举，大人。你和你的王朝已经{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}失去了我的信任{/d}，如今，我要对你进行审判。”
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."

traits.locale_text: “来这里恐怕不是什么明智的决定，大人。你和你的王朝已经失去了我的信任，你接下来会在军事法庭上遭到审判。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Es war unklug von Euch, herzukommen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr und Eure Dynastie, Ihr habt {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}mein Vertrauen verloren{/d}, und nun wartet das Urteil auf Euch."
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."

traits.locale_text: "Es war nicht die beste Entscheidung, hierherzukommen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr und Eure Dynastie, Ihr habt mein Vertrauen verloren, und Ihr werdet vor ein Kriegsgericht gestellt."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「ここに来たのは賢明な決断ではなかったようだな、陛下。あなたとその王朝は{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}私の信頼を失い{/d}、今となっては裁きが待っているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに来たのは賢明な決断ではなかったようだな、陛下。あなたとその王朝は{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}私の信頼を失い{/d}、今となっては裁きが待っているだけだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Buraya gelmek pek de ihtiyatlı bir davranış değildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Siz ve hanedanlığınız {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}güvenimi kaybettiniz{/d}, şimdiyse sonunuz sizi bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "Coming here was hardly prudent of you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You and your dynasty have {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}lost my trust{/d}, and now judgement awaits you."
